datasets.name: edc664c5
datasets.displayName: Monthly and Product Based Sales Analysis
queryLines:
-- Sales Trends Over Time (Monthly)
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('month', fs.order_date) AS month,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month;

-- Sales Trends Over Time by Category
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('month', fs.order_date) AS month,
  dp.category,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_products dp ON fs.product_key = dp.product_key
GROUP BY month, dp.category
ORDER BY month, total_sales DESC;

-- Sales by Product Category & Subcategory
SELECT
  dp.category,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_products dp ON fs.product_key = dp.product_key
GROUP BY dp.category
ORDER BY total_sales DESC;

-- Top Products by Sales
SELECT
  dp.product_name,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_products dp ON fs.product_key = dp.product_key
GROUP BY dp.product_name
ORDER BY total_sales DESC
LIMIT 10;

-- Top Customers by Sales
SELECT
  dc.first_name || ' ' || dc.last_name AS customer,
  dc.country,
  dc.gender,
  dc.marital_status,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_customers dc ON fs.customer_key = dc.customer_key
GROUP BY dc.first_name || ' ' || dc.last_name, dc.country, dc.gender, dc.marital_status
ORDER BY total_sales DESC
LIMIT 10;

-- Sales by Customer Demographics
SELECT
  dc.country,
  dc.gender,
  dc.marital_status,
  FLOOR(DATEDIFF(fs.order_date, dc.birthdate)/10)*10 AS age_group,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_customers dc ON fs.customer_key = dc.customer_key
GROUP BY dc.country, dc.gender, dc.marital_status, age_group
ORDER BY total_sales DESC;

-- Average Order Value by Country
SELECT
  dc.country,
  AVG(fs.sales_amount) AS avg_order_value
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_customers dc ON fs.customer_key = dc.customer_key
GROUP BY dc.country
ORDER BY avg_order_value DESC;

-- Product Performance by Maintenance Flag
SELECT
  dp.maintenance_flag,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_products dp ON fs.product_key = dp.product_key
GROUP BY dp.maintenance_flag
ORDER BY total_sales DESC;

-- Order Fulfillment Analysis
SELECT
  AVG(DATEDIFF(fs.shipping_date, fs.order_date)) AS avg_shipping_days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN fs.due_date < fs.shipping_date THEN 1 END) AS overdue_orders
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs;

datasets.name: c81a1467
datasets.displayName: Sales Insights by Month and Category
queryLines:
USE CATALOG `workspace`;
USE SCHEMA `gold`;

-- Sales Trends Over Time (Monthly)
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('month', fs.order_date) AS month,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month;

-- Sales Trends Over Time by Category
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('month', fs.order_date) AS month,
  dp.category,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_products dp ON fs.product_key = dp.product_key
GROUP BY month, dp.category
ORDER BY month, total_sales DESC;

-- Sales by Product Category & Subcategory
SELECT
  dp.category,
  dp.subcategory,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_products dp ON fs.product_key = dp.product_key
GROUP BY dp.category, dp.subcategory
ORDER BY total_sales DESC;

-- Top Products by Sales
SELECT
  dp.product_name,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales,
  SUM(fs.quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_products dp ON fs.product_key = dp.product_key
GROUP BY dp.product_name
ORDER BY total_sales DESC
LIMIT 10;

-- Top Customers by Sales
SELECT
  dc.first_name || ' ' || dc.last_name AS customer,
  dc.country,
  dc.gender,
  dc.marital_status,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_customers dc ON fs.customer_key = dc.customer_key
GROUP BY dc.first_name || ' ' || dc.last_name, dc.country, dc.gender, dc.marital_status
ORDER BY total_sales DESC
LIMIT 10;

-- Sales by Customer Demographics
SELECT
  dc.country,
  dc.gender,
  dc.marital_status,
  FLOOR(DATEDIFF(fs.order_date, dc.birthdate)/10)*10 AS age_group,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_customers dc ON fs.customer_key = dc.customer_key
GROUP BY dc.country, dc.gender, dc.marital_status, age_group
ORDER BY total_sales DESC;

-- Average Order Value by Segment (Country, Gender)
SELECT
  dc.country,
  dc.gender,
  AVG(fs.sales_amount) AS avg_order_value
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_customers dc ON fs.customer_key = dc.customer_key
GROUP BY dc.country, dc.gender
ORDER BY avg_order_value DESC;

-- Product Performance by Maintenance Flag
SELECT
  dp.maintenance_flag,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales,
  SUM(fs.quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_products dp ON fs.product_key = dp.product_key
GROUP BY dp.maintenance_flag
ORDER BY total_sales DESC;

-- Order Fulfillment Analysis
SELECT
  AVG(DATEDIFF(fs.shipping_date, fs.order_date)) AS avg_shipping_days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN fs.due_date < fs.shipping_date THEN 1 END) AS overdue_orders
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs;

-- Sales Heatmap by Product Line and Country
SELECT
  dp.product_line,
  dc.country,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_products dp ON fs.product_key = dp.product_key
JOIN dim_customers dc ON fs.customer_key = dc.customer_key
GROUP BY dp.product_line, dc.country
ORDER BY dp.product_line, dc.country;

datasets.name: f7784981

queryLines:

ORDER BY total_sales DESC
LIMIT 10;

datasets.name: 8d5a74a3
queryLines:
-- Average Order Value by Country
SELECT
  dc.country,
  AVG(fs.sales_amount) AS avg_order_value
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_customers dc ON fs.customer_key = dc.customer_key
GROUP BY dc.country
ORDER BY avg_order_value DESC;

datasets.name: 80f825d7
queryLines:
-- Order Fulfillment Analysis
SELECT
  AVG(DATEDIFF(fs.shipping_date, fs.order_date)) AS avg_shipping_days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN fs.due_date < fs.shipping_date THEN 1 END) AS overdue_orders
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs;

datasets.name: b0ae7a41
queryLines:
-- Product Performance by Maintenance Flag
SELECT
  dp.maintenance_flag,
  SUM(fs.sales_amount) AS total_sales
FROM workspace.salesdb.fact_sales fs
JOIN dim_products dp ON fs.product_key = dp.product_key
GROUP BY dp.maintenance_flag
ORDER BY total_sales DESC;

frame.title: Sales over time, coloured by category
